description: Transact-SQL is an essential skill for data professionals and developers working with SQL databases.
learning_outcomes: Write efficient Transact-SQL queries to retrieve data.
Define and manipulate data using T-SQL commands.
Implement data security measures using T-SQL.
Develop stored procedures for data access and manipulation.

description: Move beyond basic data analytics and apply the working knowledge of SQL to query and transform a database.
learning_outcomes: Formulate complex SQL queries to analyze data.
Transform data using SQL functions and operators.
Apply SQL to perform data aggregation and summarization.
Filter and subset data based on specific criteria using SQL.
Design and implement basic database structures.
